definition: to receive/to accept/to enjoy/to bring into/to pay (tax etc)/nano- (one billionth)/to reinforce sole of shoes or stockings by close sewing

sentences.english: I worked with Viktor Frankl, a Nazi prison camp survivor, for many years.
sentences.chinese: 長期以來，我曾幫助過一位納粹集中營倖存者。
我很氣，叫了他一聲“死納粹”。

sentences.english: They decided that the establishment of a separate society founded on Nazi principles of genetic purity was the answer.
sentences.chinese: 這答案是建立一純正的納粹理想的亞利安社會。

sentences.english: A Soviet naval base near Murmansk helped the Nazi attack on Norway.
sentences.chinese: 蘇聯摩爾曼斯克一處海軍基地協助納粹攻擊挪威。

sentences.english: When Henrik and his German father become Nazis , the family had changed.
sentences.chinese: 當漢力克與他的德藉父親參加納粹後，家族變質。

sentences.english: This is direct evidence that was used against the Nazis during the Nuremburg Trials.
sentences.chinese: 這是直接的證據表明，被用來反對納粹的紐倫堡審判。

sentences.english: Nazism was not only nationalism run amok.
sentences.chinese: 納粹不僅僅是殺氣騰騰的國家主義。

sentences.english: Fanta is a tasty orange-flavored drink that was originally designed specifically for the Nazis.
sentences.chinese: 芬達最初是專門爲納粹設計的美味的桔子味飲料。

sentences.english: It was a confirmation that the Nazis are still there and still active.
sentences.chinese: 這證實了納粹黨仍然存在着，並活動着。

sentences.english: POWs excavated three tunnels below this Nazi stronghold.
sentences.chinese: 戰俘們在這個納粹據點地下挖出了三條隧道。
達濠，納粹第一個集中營，完工。

sentences.english: 1944 - World War II: Nazi forces occupy Hungary.
sentences.chinese: 1944年的今天，二戰中納粹軍隊佔領了匈牙利。

sentences.english: The original Fanta was a Nazi product.
sentences.chinese: 最初的芬達是個納粹產品。

sentences.english: The Nazi war criminals were condemned for crimes against humanity.
sentences.chinese: 納粹戰犯因其滅絕人性的罪行而被判刑。

sentences.english: In the study of neo-nazi thinking, the reference to insects is very precious.
sentences.chinese: 在研究新納粹思想，參考昆蟲，是十分珍貴的。

sentences.english: Even the Hitlers had not destroyed it by wantoning and indiscriminate bombing to London.
sentences.chinese: 二戰中納粹德國對倫敦的狂轟濫炸也未能將它摧毀。

pinyin: Di4 er4 Ci4 Shi4 jie4 Da4 zhan4

definition: to break up into components/to disintegrate/to collapse/to crumble
Soviet Union, 1922-1991/abbr. for Union of Soviet Socialist Republics (USSR) 蘇維埃社會主義共和國聯盟|苏维埃社会主义共和国联盟[Su1 wei2 ai1 She4 hui4 zhu3 yi4 Gong4 he2 guo2 Lian2 meng2]
an execution/to put sb to death
